attributes.action: Testing to be offered after 2 early miscarriages or 1 late miscarriage
attributes.additional_details: Currently Women have to endure 3 early losses before being offered testing on the NHS. I would like to see guidelines changed and Women who have experienced 2 early losses to be supported and given the necessary testing.  It is hoped that all Women who have experienced one late loss have been offered testing as current guidelines recommend.

rejection.details: Please see: Women to be offered testing after 2 miscarriages
